title: URF
body: Can we actually have URF back? I'm tired of having every other game mode and the same one like 2-3 times in a row every weekend (beside Poro King) but I swear URF has only been out like once or twice ever since the games modes rolled out for each weekend, we should be having URF like many times on weekends since it hasn't been out a lot at all -.-

replies.body: wierd, an urf rant has no comments, lol

Maybe because people are actually sick of hearing this "bring back URF" sh!t.

We had it for years when there was no RGM and it's not changed since RGM was added.

It's make you think people will always complain, even if URF was made available 24/7.
either way, this is the first urf rant ive seen that hasnt been overblown or had a flame war or, even commented on
